name: Wire
description:
Looming anxiety and an absurd obsession with her mortality cause Carissa to spiral down into a dark and inescapable impasse for she believes her unreasonable actions will prevent her own death she obscurely dreamt about when she was a child.
Experience the cathartic and gruesome story of Carissa and the many intangible situations she finds herself in as she faces off against countless horrors and creatures that plague her reality.

By bringing elements of classic survival horror and putting it through the lens of a modern game, WIRE is sure to deliver a nostalgic yet absolutely unique gaming experience that will not be forgotten.

Key Features


  • Stay awake long enough to find a safe place to sleep before you find yourself too tired to go on any farther.
  • With no flashlight, you must find a light switch to see what's inside the many dark rooms and halls you encounter on your journey, for you never know what you might accidentally walk into.
  • Fight against Carissa's anxiety and instincts so you don't lose control of her and what she does.
  • Fend off or flee from the few but wicked terrors that reside in Emily's reality.
  • Vast amounts of replayability with multiple endings and bonus content for completing the game.
  • Full controller and keyboard/mouse support so you can play however you choose.
